attributes.title: BLACK LIVES MATTER
attributes.review: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE! AS SOON AS I DOWNLOADED THIS APP IT CASTED DARK MAGIC SPELLS AND POSSIBLY KILLED MY CAT! ROACHES CAME IN MY HOUSE AND STARTED TALKING TO ME AS IF I WAS THEIR MOTHER AND CHASED ME DOWN THE HALLWAY INTO MY CASTLE! GHOST AND MUMMIES STARTING CHASING AFTER ME AND BEFORE I EVEN REALIZED SCOOBY DOO MUSIC STARTED PLAYING! DONT RECOMMEND THIS APP AT ALL 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮THIS BUNKER BOY APP IS DISAPPOINTING 💕💕✨✨✨✨🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮❤️
